resources.string: What pub are you looking for?

From College Green, turn left and walk down Nassau Street. Take the first right turn and walk all the way up Dawson Street. Then, turn left at St. Stephen\'s Green and continue on to Merrion Row. You will then see O\' Donoghue\'s on the right.
From College Green walk straight up Dame Street. Take the third left turn and walk up South Great George\'s Street. The Long Hall is just beyond Fade Street.

From O\'Connell Street, walk over O\'Connell bridge and continue straight onto D\'Olier Street. At the end of this street, take a right up to College Green. From there, walk up Dame Street and turn left onto Trinity Street. Turn right onto Dame Lane and you\'ll see The Stag\'s Head up on the left.

From O\'Connell Street, walk over O\'Connell bridge and turn right onto Aston Quay. Walk straight until you come to the Ha\'penny bridge. Then, turn left and walk under Merchant Arch. You are now in Temple Bar, the Temple Bar is down the cobblestones on the right.
From O\'Connell Street, walk over O\'Connell bridge and turn left onto Burgh Quay. J.W. Sweetman is just a few steps away.
From O\'Connell Street, walk all the way down to Parnell Street and turn right. Fibber Magees is just a few feet away.

From O\'Connell Street, walk over O\'Connell bridge and continue straight onto D\'Olier Street. At the end of this street, take a right up to College Green. From there, walk up Dame Street and turn left onto South Great Georges Street. Walk up this street a bit and you\'ll see The Globe Bar on your left.
